snippet: Murders and other serious crimes in Los Angeles dropped to more than 40-year lows in 2013, Mayor Eric Garcetti said on Monday, crediting a citywide focus on prevention and intervention....

headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Murders, Violent Crime Dip to Lowest Level in Decades
headline.main: Los Angeles Murders, Violent Crime Dip to Lowest Level in Decades

lead_paragraph: Murders and other serious crimes in Los Angeles dropped to more than 40-year lows in 2013, Mayor Eric Garcetti said on Monday, crediting a citywide focus on prevention and intervention.
